LanguageData.RBB.NotOnFS: Cannot be placed over a fishing spot
LanguageData.RBB.FishingSpot1: Must be placed with the fishing spot over water or marsh
LanguageData.RBB.FishingSpot2: Must be placed with the fishing spot (mouse cursor) over water and the interaction spot (white circle) on land or a bridge
LanguageData.RBB.ShellfishTrap: Must be placed on water or marsh adjacent to land or a bridge
LanguageData.RBB.CaughtNothing1: {0} failed to catch anything while fishing.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapDestroyed: A shellfish trap has been damaged beyond repair.
LanguageData.RBB.FishingEfficiencyTip: Lower this setting if you feel your are provided with too many fish; increase it if you feel they're not providing enough.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapEfficiencyTip: Lower this setting if you feel your traps are yielding too much; increase it if you feel they're not yielding enough.
LanguageData.RBB.NoticeDing: Simple text notification with an alert "ding."
LanguageData.RBB.NoticeBox: An event box which must be dismissed.
LanguageData.RBB.FishingBuildingEfficiencyTip: How efficient it is to catch fish here.
LanguageData.RBB.MaxJunkMassTip: Maximum junk mass that can be caught
LanguageData.RBB.TreasureChanceTip: Chance to catch treasure when fishing
LanguageData.RBB.TreasureMaxValueTip: Maximum price of treasure thet can be fished
LanguageData.RBB.JunkChanceTip: Chance to catch junk on not catching fish
LanguageData.RBB.RoeChanceTip: Chance to catch roe fish on spawning period
LanguageData.RBB.CaughtNothing: failed to catch anything while fishing.
LanguageData.RBB.FSTooClose: Another fishing spot is too close (within 9 tiles)
LanguageData.RBB.TrapTooClose: Another shellfish trap is too close (within 6 tiles)
LanguageData.RBB.TragedyText: was bitten by an oddly aggressive fish. (Or perhaps it was an eel. It all happened so fast!) Medical attention may be required!
LanguageData.RBB.TragedyPiranhaText: was attacked by a school of piranhas! Medical attention may be required!
LanguageData.RBB.TragedyJellyfishText: was badly stung by a jellyfish! Medical attention may be required!
LanguageData.RBB.Jellyfish: caught a jellyfish, fortunately without being stung!
LanguageData.RBB.Sturgeon: caught a sturgeon! Maybe you'll be eating caviar soon?
LanguageData.RBB.TinyFish: caught a tiny fish. Better than nothing....
LanguageData.RBB.TrapLobster: A shellfish trap caught a lobster!
LanguageData.RBB.TrapCrab: A shellfish trap caught a crab.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapShrimp: A shellfish trap caught some shrimp.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapFish: A shellfish trap caught some tiny fish.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapCrayfish: A shellfish trap caught some crayfish.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapSnail: A shellfish trap caught some snails.
LanguageData.RBB.FishersHaul: Fishing Pawns Haul Their Own Catches to Storage.
LanguageData.RBB.FishersHaulTip: If this is checked, fishing pawns will stop every time they catch something and haul it to a nearby storage area. This will make fishing less efficient, but will prevent other pawns from being interrupted from their own tasks to haul fish instead.
LanguageData.RBB.UseRecipesTip: If this option is unchecked, the mod's seafood recipes will no longer appear as bills at stoves. This will keep the bills list shorter. (Fish and shellfish meat will of course still be usable as ingredients in vanilla meals.) Note that changes to this setting require a game restart before they will take effect.
